function(ImGuiBackend backendName)
	string(TOUPPER "IMGUI_${backendName}" LIBNAME)
	add_library(${LIBNAME} STATIC "imgui_impl_${backendName}.cpp")
	target_include_directories(${LIBNAME} PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/..)
endfunction(ImGuiBackend)

ImGuiBackend(sdl2)
target_link_libraries(IMGUI_SDL2 PRIVATE SDL2::SDL2)

if(${RENDERING_BACKEND} STREQUAL "DX11")
	ImGuiBackend(dx11)
	target_link_libraries(IMGUI_SDL2 PUBLIC IMGUI_DX11)
elseif(${RENDERING_BACKEND} STREQUAL "Vulkan")
	ImGuiBackend(vulkan)
	target_link_libraries(IMGUI_SDL2 PUBLIC IMGUI_VULKAN)
elseif(${RENDERING_BACKEND} STREQUAL "OpenGL")
	ImGuiBackend(opengl3)
	target_link_libraries(IMGUI_SDL2 PUBLIC IMGUI_OPENGL)
endif()
